info.name: Task Manager
info.description:
# ðŸŽ¯Task Manager API

This is a simple Task Manager API built with Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. The API allows users to manage tasks with basic functionalities like creating, updating, deleting, and retrieving tasks.

item.name: User Authentication
item.description:
### 1\. Signup (Register a New User)

- **Method**: `POST`
    
- **URL**: `http://localhost:8000/api/auth/signup`
    
- **Body** (JSON):
    

``` json
{
 "name": "User Name",
 "email": "user@example.com",
 "password": "password123" 
}

 ```

**Expected Response**:

``` json
{
  "status": "success",
  "code": 201,
  "message": "User registered successfully",
  "token": "your_jwt_token",
   "data": {
        "user": {
            "username": "Username",
            "email": "user@example.com",
            "_id": "",
            "createdAt": "",
            "updatedAt": ""
        }
    }
}

 ```

### 2\. Login

- **Method**: `POST`
    
- **URL**: `http://localhost:8000/api/auth/login`
    
- **Body** (JSON):
    

``` json
{
 "email": "user@example.com",
 "password": "password123" 
}

 ```

- **Expected Response**
    

``` json
{
  "status": "success",
  "code": 200,
  "message":"login successfully",
  "token": "your_jwt_token",
  "data": {
        "user": {
            "username": "Username",
            "email": "user@example.com",
            "_id": "",
            "createdAt": "",
            "updatedAt": ""
        }
    }
}

 ```

### 3\. Logout

- **Method**: GET
    
- **URL**: `http://localhost:8000/api/auth/logout`
    
- **Headers**:
    
    - `Authorization`: `Bearer`
        
- **Expected Responsedy** (JSON):
    

``` json
{
    "status": "success",
    "code": 200,
    "message": "logout successfully"
}

 ```

item.name: Task Management
item.description:
### 1\. Create Task

- **Method**: `POST`
    
- **URL**: `http://localhost:8000/api/task/create`
    
- **Headers:**
    
    - `Authorization`: `Bearer`
        
- **Body** (JSON):
    

``` json
{  
  "title": "Sample Task",
   "description":"", //opitional
   "status": "completed"  // optional, default is "incomplete"
}

 ```

- **Expected Response**
    

``` json
{
 "status": "success",
 "code": 201,
 "message": "Task created successfully",
 "task": { 
   "userID": "objectId",
        "title": "taskTitle",
        "status": "incomplete",
        "description":"your_description",
        "_id": "objectId",
        "createdAt": "2024-11-07T12:19:48.635Z",
        "updatedAt": "2024-11-07T12:19:48.635Z",
 }
}

 ```

---

### 2\. Get All Tasks

- **Method**: `GET`
    
- **URL**: `http://localhost:8000/api/task/get/all`
    
- **Headers**:
    
    - `Authorization`: `Bearer`
        
- **Expected Response**
    

``` json
{
 "status": "success",
 "code": 200,
 "totalTasks": <number_of_tasks>,
 "task": [{ 
   "userID": {
            "_id": "objectId",
            "username": "Username",
            "email": "example@gmail.com"
        },,
        "title": "taskTitle",
        "status": "incomplete",
         "description":"your_description",
        "_id": "objectId",
        "createdAt": "2024-11-07T12:19:48.635Z",
        "updatedAt": "2024-11-07T12:19:48.635Z",
 },{...}
]
}

 ```

---

### 3\. Get One Task

- **Method**: `GET`
    
- **URL**: `http://localhost:8000/api/task/get/one:taskID`
    
- **Headers**:
    
    - `Authorization`: `Bearer`
        
- **Expected Response**
    

``` json
{
 "status": "success",
 "code": 200,
 "message": "Task retrieved successfully",
 "task": { 
   "userID": {
            "_id": "objectId",
            "username": "Username",
            "email": "example@gmail.com"
        },,
        "title": "taskTitle",
        "status": "incomplete",
         "description":"your_description",
        "_id": "objectId",
        "createdAt": "2024-11-07T12:19:48.635Z",
        "updatedAt": "2024-11-07T12:19:48.635Z",
 }
}

 ```

---

### 4\. Update Task

- **Method**: PUT
    
- **URL**: `http://localhost:8000/api/task/update/:taskID`
    
- **Headers**:
    
    - `Authorization`: `Bearer`
        
- Body (JSON):
    

``` json
{
  "title": "Updated Task Title",
  "status": "completed"  // or "incomplete"
}

 ```

- **Expected Response:**
    

``` json
{
 "status": "success",
 "code": 200,
 "message": "Task updated successfully",
 "task": { 
    "userID": {
            "_id": "objectId",
            "username": "Username",
            "email": "example@gmail.com"
        },,
        "title": "taskTitle",
        "status": "incomplete",
         "description":"your_description",
        "_id": "objectId",
        "createdAt": "2024-11-07T12:19:48.635Z",
        "updatedAt": "2024-11-07T12:19:48.635Z",
 }
}

 ```

---

### 5\. Delete Task

- **Method**: `DELETE`
    
- **URL**: `http://localhost:8000/api/task/delete/one/:taskID`
    
- **Headers**:
    
    - `Authorization`: `Bearer`
        
- **Expected Response:**
    

``` json
{
  "status": "success",
  "code": 200,
  "message": "Task deleted successfully"
}

 ```

---

### 6\. Delete All Tasks

- **Method**: `DELETE`
    
- **URL**: `http://localhost:8000/api/task/delete/all`
    
- **Headers**:
    
    - `Authorization`: `Bearer`
        
- **Expected Response:**
    

``` json
{ 
"status": "success",
 "code": 200, 
 "message": "All tasks deleted successfully"
}

 ```

---

### 7\. Get Tasks by Status

- **Method**: `GET`
    
- **URL**: `http://localhost:8000/api/task/status/:status`
    
    - Replace `:status` with `completed` or `incomplete`.
        
- **Headers**:
    
    - `Authorization`: `Bearer`
        
- **Expected Response**
    

``` json
{ 
"status": "success",
 "code": 200,
 "totalTasks": ,
 "task": [{ 
   "userID": {
            "_id": "objectId",
            "username": "Username",
            "email": "example@gmail.com"
        },,
        "title": "taskTitle",
        "status": "incomplete",
         "description":"your_description",
        "_id": "objectId",
        "createdAt": "2024-11-07T12:19:48.635Z",
        "updatedAt": "2024-11-07T12:19:48.635Z",
 },{...}
]
}

 ```

---

### 8\. Mark Task (Toggle Status)

- **URL**: `http://localhost:8000/api/task/mark/:taskID`
    
- **Headers**:
    
    - `Authorization`: `Bearer`
        
- **Expected Response**
    

``` json
{ 
 "status": "success",
 "code": 200, "message": "Task marked as ", // "completed" or "incomplete" 
 "task": { 
    "userID": {
            "_id": "objectId",
            "username": "Username",
            "email": "example@gmail.com"
        },,
        "title": "taskTitle",
        "status": "incomplete",
         "description":"your_description",
        "_id": "objectId",
        "createdAt": "2024-11-07T12:19:48.635Z",
        "updatedAt": "2024-11-07T12:19:48.635Z",
 }
}

 ```
